name: Adventures' Edge
description:
Making a game in Godot to challenge everything. Making a few tutorials as I go:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLX8H1qIvxRFUoWCJrvUUZXn5SCU_HDLGa

The "feature" error was my bad. So far you can deploy four creatures, walk around, breed them, Capture the child, give items when needed, and read a sign.

Has audio!

Thakns to Opengameart for some resources.

I cannot guarantee that any releases other than windows will work.

Please leave helpful comments.

Version 0.03:

Added new Lazuna

You can now buy items

Get bits from defeating Lazuna

There is a rare bug that might crash the game, I know what causes it but I cannot fix it.

The Lazuna try to access an invalid target for some reason.

I'm going to fix some things and edit the looks for the next update. I'll try to update every week, so I'll just upload win32 and linux 64 builds unless there are requests for other platforms. Not releasing to mobile, even if the controls are good for it.


Look for new "features" during the next game jam I enter.

Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/PlanetKiller
